excerpt.rendered:
The Menu of the day is ordered until 15:00 pm

28 lei without dessert / 41 lei with dessert

Tuesday – 22 of December

Cream Vegetable Soup – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 330 ml  (carrot, zucchini, celery, white onion, potato, tomato, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Stir–fry with Basmati Rice & Seeds – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 300 g (red bell pepper, zucchini, champinion mushrooms, carrot, celery, red onion, cashew, sunflower seeds, pumpkin seeds, cow berry, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Whole Wheat Bread – vegan / with gluten / 70 g (whole wheat, yeast, olive oil, himalayan salt)

or gluten free option

Hemp seeds & Tomato Crackers Bread – raw / gluten free / 40 g (white onion, millet, tomato, hemp seed, flaxseed, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Amandina Cake – raw / gluten free / 110 g (cashews, natural cocoa, almonds, cocoa butter, vanilla, alkaline cocoa, psyllium, coffee, unfiltered honey)
